subject: RE: [junit] Re: Another question on assertEquals()
msgSnippet: ... Perhaps they are using JUnit as a test driver for automated external (QA-style) tests that just happen to use Java as their scripting language. That s
messageBody:
> > I don't understand why /any/ project would
> > ask non-coders (or people who can code, but are not allowed
> to code on
> > the project, like testers) to test any code with JUnit.

Perhaps they are using JUnit as a test driver for
"automated external (QA-style) tests" that just
happen to use Java as their scripting language.
That's what we do, and it's working pretty well,
thank you.


Todd.
